A QUIZ APP
Where history meets a musical...\nand trivia!
How long did it take Lin-Manuel Miranda to write the first two songs of the musical?
1 day
6 months
1 year
2 years
Which of the following are true about Hamilton: An American Musical?
Hamilton averages about 144 words/min with 20,520 words and a runtime of 2 hours and 23 minutes
Lin-Manuel Miranda played the role of Aaron Burr
In the original casting, the only main character played by a white actor is King George

In 2009, the writer was invited to the White House to sing a song that represented America to President Obama. He chose to sing a song about Secretary-Treasurer, Alexander Hamilton, from a hip hop album he was working on
